channel.title: Android Game on My little software warehouse
channel.description: Recent content in Android Game on My little software warehouse

item.title: first 18 days of pegdroid
item.description: It's already been 18 days, and it's time to make some considerations. For those who don't know what pegdroid is, it's a simple peg solitaire for android. I released it 18 days ago, it's free and it's basically ad-supported (but I don't get much from that). I integrated google analytics in my app, so I can get some help from the statistics I get every day. In the meanwhile, the market dashboard got updated and I also can see which kind of device are the most popular.
